channel.title: Do I need to insert SIM card for using Octave?
channel.description:
Do I need to insert a SIM card to use Octave/Atmosphere for MangOH Yellow? Or Can i configure Wi-Fi and use the same?
My device is MangOH yellow and module is WP7611. In USA, which carrier would you recommend if a SIM card is needed?
